metadata.title: Washable Adjustable Swim Diapers, Baby Reusable Swim Diaper (Ladybug)
features: Felix+Clio's Swimsuit diapers are adjustable and the 1 size fits most design with snap buttons helps you adjust the diaper to the perfect size and would fit most babies ages 1 to 3 years or anywhere from 16 to 30lbs. Sizing equivalent to Small, Medium and Large or Size 1 to 5. Fitting may depend on your baby or toddler's actual measurements.

Made of high quality PUL material - Carefully selected waterproof cloth that is also beach and pool friendly. PUL fabric is also extremely breathable and keeps your baby cool and comfy and the soft elastic leggings provides superior comfort and helps delay leakage in the water.

Reusable diapers have long been known to be more Eco Friendly than disposable diapers. Reusable swim diapers are washable, easy to dry and ready to use again in a very short period of time and does not need to be disposed even after many uses thus reducing toxic wastes which is bad for the planet.
Choose from 10 different stylish multicolored patterns like Green, Lime and Pink Chevron, Robots and Rockets and more! Save money and the earth from disposable diapers in style!
description: Felix+Cleo Reusable Swim Diapers are eco friendly diapers that adjusts to fit most infants and toddlers. Our diaper is made of PUL fabric which is great for use as a reusable diaper or swimwear, it is extremely breathable to make sure that the baby is cool and comfy. The polyester mesh inner layer is soft and easy to clean. You don't have to worry about having excess water in fabric against baby's skin which is the #1 cause for diaper rash in swim diapers. The elastic around the waist and legs is comfortable and doesn't cause chaffing like the tough elastic in other diapers or the scratchy fabric from disposable diapers.
